type='bool'><![CDATA[false]]></FailOnTypeMismatch><FailOnCodePageMismatch type='bool'><![CDATA[false]]></FailOnCodePageMismatch></SchemaReconciliation><IsolationLevel type='int'><![CDATA[0]]></IsolationLevel><ArraySize type='int'><![CDATA[500]]></ArraySize></Session><MigratedJob type='bool'><![CDATA[true]]></MigratedJob><Transaction><RecordCount type='int'><![CDATA[0]]></RecordCount></Transaction><TableName type='string'><![CDATA[CDM0.CUST_DATA_AUDIT_QS]]></TableName><SQL><SelectStatement type='string'><![CDATA[SELECT b.MIGRTN_CODE,b.CUST#,a.NAME,a.ADR_1,a.ADR_2,SUBSTR(TRIM(a.CITY),1,30),a.STATE_NAME, a.STATE_CODE,a.ZIPCODE,a.CNTRY_CODE_2,a.CNTRY_CODE,a.REGION, rtrim(coalesce(b.STATUS,'')), ltrim(rtrim(coalesce(b.CDM_COMMENTS,''))), a.RESELLER_NAME, coalesce(b.IBM_CUST_NUM,''), coalesce(b.NEW_RDH_SITE,'') FROM CDM0.CUST_DATA_AUDIT_QS a, CDM1.cust_data b where a.MIGRTN_CODE = b.MIGRTN_CODE and a.cust# = b.CUST#;]]></SelectStatement></SQL></Usage><Connection><Database type='string'><![CDATA[#$DSS_DB_NAME#]]></Database><Username type='string'><![CDATA[#$DSS_DB_USERNAME#]]></Username><Password type='string'><![CDATA[#$DSS_DB_PASSWD#]]></Password></Connection></Properties>

SELECT b.MIGRTN_CODE,b.CUST# as CUST__035__,a.NAME,a.ADR_1,a.ADR_2,SUBSTR(TRIM(a.CITY),1,30) as CITY,a.STATE_NAME, a.STATE_CODE,a.ZIPCODE,a.CNTRY_CODE_2,a.CNTRY_CODE,a.REGION, rtrim(coalesce(b.STATUS,'')) as STATUS, ltrim(rtrim(coalesce(b.CDM_COMMENTS,''))) as CDM_COMMENTS, a.RESELLER_NAME, coalesce(b.IBM_CUST_NUM,'') as IBM_CUST_NUM,cast( coalesce(b.NEW_RDH_SITE,'') as char(1)) as NEW_RDH_SITEFROM
